metadata.title: CVE-2016-0718 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Expat allows context-dependent attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) or possibly execute arbitrary code via a malformed input document, which triggers a buffer overflow.

notes.note: ebarretto> tla uses system expat as of 1.3.5+dfsg-15

criterions.comment: cadaver package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
coin3 package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
expat package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.1.1-1ubuntu1').
firefox package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '48.0+build2-0ubuntu1').
matanza package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
swish-e package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
tla package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.3.5+dfsg-15').
xmlrpc-c package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
